A4: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(2″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 60%; m.p. 70 °C; R
f = 0.7 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1646 (C=O), 1602 (C=C Ar), 1514 (CH=CH), 1249 (-CF 3), 3010 (Ar C-H stretching), 1461 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.77 (1H, d, J = 17.1 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.11 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 8.12–8.51 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.70–8.01 (4H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 322.11 [M + H] +.
